bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: The document mentions a suit brought by Dr. E. M. Campbell against Edward E. Lathim, both of Washington County, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a Court Document, May 28, 1860, Washington County, Virginia, signed by John S. Kreger, likely a Court Clerk. This document orders Edward E. Lathim to pay E. M. Campbell $20.00 for a post-mortem examination of Lathim's slave Jessee, said to be killed near Bristol.
